Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt and Chestnut: near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt, Chestnut and over regular route: due to police activity near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/127th

Southbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Vermont and over regular route: due to street blockage near Halsted/127th.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute at Vincennes/80th
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Vincennes, 79th, Halsted & 87th, due to fire department activity near Vincennes/80th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Vincennes, 79th, Halsted and 87th, due to fire department activity near Vincennes/80th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop 'L' Service Delayed near State/Lake
ShortDescription: Loop 'L'  trains trains are delayed near State/Lake. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop 'L'  trains are delayed with significant delays near State/Lake due to police department activity at Clark/lake. 

As a result of the delay, Pink Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop  (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Clark/Lake, State/Lake, Washington/Wabash, Adams/Wabash, Library/State-Van Buren, LaSalle/Van Buren, Quincy/Wells and Washington/Wells).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
